segments.text: I'm observing the children and their daring escapade.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy is quite brave, climbing on that unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so wobbly, its legs splayed out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretched so high, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His hand is already deep inside, pulling out the treasures.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing below him, eagerly awaiting her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her hand is outstretched, a clear signal of anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're working together, a little team of cookie thieves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a clever plan, executed while the adult is distracted.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that stool, I keep looking at it; it could tip any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a jolt of alarm thinking about him falling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a predicament they're in, all for a sweet treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their determination is impressive, if a bit risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope they don't get hurt in their quest.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sheer audacity of it all is quite something.
segments.speaker: PAR
